name: Language of Nature
description:
Recompose images of flowers and plants, more than 1250 levels available
You can also discover many curiosities about plants and flowers

Did you know that the flower representing the love is the Tulip and not the Rose?
With this app you would have known! :)

Play when you have some free time
Refer to it when you have to gift a flower

Do not give a flower only for its beauty but also to convey a deep meaning!
